alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Lorain; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:26PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Huron, Ottawa, northern Seneca, Erie, Sandusky, southeastern Wood and west central Lorain Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 626 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Kelleys Island to Gibsonburg. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lorain, Sandusky, Norwalk, Fremont, Vermilion, Western Vermilion, Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Amherst, Bellevue, Clyde, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Woodville, Elmore, Green Springs, Northern Milan, Milan and Wakeman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Erie; Huron; Lorain; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood
